actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act to provide that the free or reduced-rate transportation made available to railroad employees under section 405 of such Act shall also be available to employees of a bankrupt rail carrier while they are separated from their employment.

summary.text: Amends the Rail Passenger Service Act to provide free or reduced-rate transportation to specified employees while they are separated from their employment with a bankrupt rail carrier.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act to provide that the free or reduced-rate transportation made available to railroad employees under section 405 of such Act shall also be available to employees of a bankrupt rail carrier while they are separated from their employment.
